resources.string: Use a multisig wallet for maximum safety. A multisig wallet has multiple signers—if one is compromised, your funds are still safe.
To use Taproot, please note the following
If you are sending bitcoin from an exchange or a service to this wallet, please make absolutely sure that they support sending to Bech32m addresses. [B]There has been reports of loss of funds.[/B]
If you plan to use hardware keys in the wallet, please make sure that they support Taproot as well. If you are unsure, use software keys only.
What type of assisted wallet do you want to create?
Quickly create a hot wallet for immediate use and back it up later.
You don\'t have any group wallets remaining. To purchase additional group wallets, please visit nunchuk.io/my-plan.
You don\'t have any personal wallets remaining. To purchase additional personal wallets, please visit nunchuk.io/my-plan.
Generate a concealed wallet accessible via a specific PIN.
You don’t have any keys yet. Would you like to add a key now?
Taproot-based single-signature wallets function similarly to traditional single-signature wallets but use Bech32m addresses (starting with “[B]bc1p[/B]”).

On the other hand, Taproot-based multisignature wallets are more advanced. They leverage Schnorr signatures to [B]enhance privacy and reduce fees[/B], and they require two signing rounds for each transaction.
To use Taproot, please note the following
Number of signatures required to unlock funds.
Assign at least 1 key to the wallet (up to 5)
Among the keys assigned to the wallet, please select the keys to create the Value Keyset. Signing transactions with the Value Keyset will help maximize privacy and fee savings.
Changing the address type will remove all added keys.
You’ve reached the limit of 1 group wallet as a Guest user. Sign up for an account to increase the limit.
You’ve reached the maximum of 3 group wallets on this device.
